    • AdvancedPluginTimer

      public AdvancedPluginTimer​(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin owner, int time, boolean restartTimer)
      Start a new timer
      Parameters:
      owner - the owner of the plugin timer
      time - the time to count from
      restartTimer - restart the timer when it ends

    • AdvancedPluginTimer

      Parameters:
      owner - the owner of the plugin timer
      periodTime - the period time
